The Trigger: Declaration of Property Occupation - Penalties from Jan 1, 2026 Mandatory annual declaration of all property occupation status on impots.gouv.fr. €150 fine per undeclared property starting 2026
The Victim: Multi-property owners, SCIs (real estate holding companies), Property managers handling 5+ units- especially those who bought/sold properties during the year
The Manual Pain: Logging into impots.gouv.fr for each property. Manual entry of occupation dates, tenant identities, rental periods. No bulk upload option. Tracking which properties were already declared vs. new acquisitions. Remembering June 30 deadline annually.
The "Dev" Solution: PropertyDeclarationBot: Scraper that auto-fills the "Gérer mes biens immobiliers" form using Excel/CSV tenant data. Chrome extension that bulk-uploads property occupation info. Reminder system (email/SMS) 30 days before June 30 deadline. Integration with property management software (Rentila, Gererseul) to auto-sync tenant data.
Monetization: €99 one-time + €29/year renewal: Clear ROI for anyone with 2+ properties (saves €300+ in potential fines). Target 800,000+ owners of 3+ properties who face €450-900 in fines if they forget. Upsell to property managers at €199/year for unlimited properties.

The Trigger: BSD Tracking for Construction Waste (REP Bâtiment) - Ongoing enforcement tightening in 2025-2026 Since July 2021, contractors must include waste estimates in quotes + provide BSD (Bordereau de Suivi des Déchets) for every waste deposit. Fines for non-compliance increasing.
The Victim: Small/medium BTP contractors, Renovation artisans, Independent builders- those doing 5-20 jobs/month without dedicated admin staff
The Manual Pain: Manually filling out paper BSD forms at each waste collection center. Estimating waste quantities for quotes by hand. Storing 3 years of BSD paper records for audits. No standardized digital format - each collection center has different forms.
The "Dev" Solution: BSD-Auto: Mobile app that generates compliant waste quotes (with Article R. 543-277 mention). QR-code scanner at waste centers to auto-fill BSD forms. Cloud storage of all BSD records (3-year audit trail). Auto-calculation of waste costs based on PMCB type. Export to PDF for client/inspector requests.
Monetization: €19-49/month: Saves 15-30 min per job site + avoids €1,500+ fines for missing BSD documentation. Target 200,000+ small BTP contractors who must comply but lack digital tools. Regulatory pressure increasing with DREAL inspections ramping up in 2025-2026.
